com.netflix.fenzo.plugins

Class VMLeaseObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.fenzo.plugins.VMLeaseObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualMachineLease

    public class VMLeaseObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements VirtualMachineLease
    An adapter class to transform a Mesos resource offer to a Fenzo VirtualMachineLease. Pass a Mesos Offer to the VMLeaseObject constructor to transform it into an object that implements the VirtualMachineLease interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.netflix.fenzo.VirtualMachineLease

      • getScalarValues

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getScalarValues()
        Description copied from interface: VirtualMachineLease
        Get a map of all of the scalar resources with resource names as the key and resource value as the value. Although cpus, memory, networkMbps, and disk are scalar resources, Fenzo currently treats them separately. Use this scalar values collection to specify scalar resources other than those four.
        Specified by:
        getScalarValues in interface VirtualMachineLease
        Returns:
        All of the scalar resources available.
